CSS Paths Test Widget

This widget tests various CSS path mechanisms.

1. background-image: url() INLINE CSS

Background from ./assets/background.svg
background-image: url('./assets/background.svg')

2. list-style-image: url() INLINE CSS

  • Custom bullet from ./assets/bullet.svg
  • Another list item
  • Third list item
list-style-image: url('./assets/bullet.svg')

3. cursor: url() INLINE CSS

Hover here to see custom cursor (./assets/cursor.svg)
cursor: url('./assets/cursor.svg'), pointer

4. border-image: url() INLINE CSS

Border image from ./assets/border.svg
border-image: url('./assets/border.svg') 10 round

5. content: url() INLINE CSS

This text has a check icon before it

content: url('./assets/check.svg')

6. mask-image: url() INLINE CSS

Circular mask from ./assets/mask.svg applied to gradient

mask-image: url('./assets/mask.svg')

7. image-set() with bare strings INLINE CSS

Background using image-set() with bare string paths

image-set('./assets/background.svg' 1x, './assets/background.svg' 2x)

8. Multiple backgrounds with url() INLINE CSS

background-image: url('./assets/bullet.svg'), url('./assets/pattern.svg')

9. Background shorthand with url() INLINE CSS

background: url('./assets/pattern.svg') repeat top left / 20px 20px

10. @import in inline style INLINE CSS

If this has green background, @import worked

@import './assets/imported.css'

11. External CSS file with url()

If this text is green and bold, external CSS loaded.

This card has a background defined in external.css using url('./pattern.svg')

<link href="./assets/external.css"> + url('./pattern.svg') inside

Note: External CSS url() paths resolve relative to the CSS file, so they should work if the CSS file is served correctly.
